message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you at a special price, considering our long-standing relationship.  While the product is worth at least $1,500,000 to me, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,400,000.  This is a significant discount, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings to your business.  Let me know what you think!
